sentence.Network_en: The disappointing sales figures foreshadow more redundancies.
sentence.Network_cn: 令人失望的销售额预示着会有更多人被裁员。

sentence.Network_en: Their words foreshadow events to come.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的话预示了所将要发生的事情.

sentence.Network_en: The current surge of Internet - enabled cell phones and personal digital assistants ( PDAs ) foreshadow what's to come.
sentence.Network_cn: 上网手和个人数字助理 ( PDA ) 蓬勃兴起的现状预示示未来的趋势.

list.abs: 首先是预示的问题产生(foreshadowed problems)，这也就是说研究通常会开始于一些发现的问题或设定的议题(issue)，当然有实，研 …
as foreshadows , the Introduction gives a brief narration on the selection of the subject , key definitions , relevant theories , and analytical framework .作为铺垫，绪论对选题、概念、文献与理论分析框架等问题进行基本的简略陈述。

Those black clouds foreshadow a storm ., 那些乌云预示着暴风雨.

entry.def: If something foreshadows an event or situation, it suggests that it will happen.

example.ex: The disappointing sales figures foreshadow more redundancies...
example.tran: 令人失望的销售额预示着会有更多人被裁员。

example.ex: The change proposed last month was foreshadowed in the March Budget.
example.tran: 上个月提议的变动在 3 月份的预算中已经有所预兆了。

auth_sentence.content: A truce is often the foreshadow of a peace.
auth_sentence.res_content: A truce is often the foreshadow of a peace.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A truce is often the foreshadow of a peace.

auth_sentence.content: Others show hints of shapes that foreshadow the iconic Mandelbrot set.
auth_sentence.res_content: Others show hints of shapes that foreshadow the iconic Mandelbrot set.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Others show hints of shapes that foreshadow the iconic Mandelbrot set.

auth_sentence.content: Many fear the past here could foreshadow the future in the Gulf of Mexico.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many fear the past here could foreshadow the future in the Gulf of Mexico.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many fear the past here could foreshadow the future in the Gulf of Mexico.

stems_affixes.word_buile: fore前面,预先→adv.在前面 adj.先前的
fore前面,预先+going情况[说和做]→前面所说所做
fore前面,预先→adv.在前面 adj.先前的
fore前面,预先+ever永远→adv.永远,总是,老是
fore前面,预先+arm胳膊→n.前臂 v.准备战斗, 预先武装
fore前面,预先+head头→n.前额;[任何事物的]前部
fore前面,预先+shadow影子→影子预先来
fore预先+stall放→预先放上东西→制止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 准备战斗, 预先武装
stems_affixes.word_buile: fore前面,预先+arm胳膊→n.前臂 v.准备战斗, 预先武装
fore前面,预先+cast扔→预先扔下→预料
fore前面,预先+see看见→提前看见
